titleStmt.title: The Humble representation and address to His Highness of several churches & Christians in South--VVales, and Monmouth-Shire. Presented Thursday January 31.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Henry Hills and John Field; printers to His Highness,

notesStmt.note: A reply to: A word for God. Or a testimony on truths behalf.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "& printed 9th Feb: 1655"; also the last number of the imprint date has been marked through.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
